divs: Sighting Detailswe were fishing at lomis lake its briteness and speed dont know came across the horizon very fast stoped dead in its tracts hovered for a few seconds then it speed away at an incredable rate of speed my dad said holy shit i dont belive what im seeing then he got real nervous and said lets go i dont like this so we left then he told me not to tell anybody what we saw because they will think were nutswe lost sight of it when it sped away
trends: There have been no other sightings in Hop Bottom
This sighting has never been favorited.
